content: Yes, you can add a few drops of essential oils to the water while soaking your feet. Some essential oils, such as tea tree oil, lavender oil, and peppermint oil, have anti-inflammatory, antiseptic, and calming properties that can soothe and reduce dryness, irritation, and inflammation on the skin. However, it is important to dilute the essential oils with a carrier oil such as coconut oil or olive oil, as the oils can be too strong and cause skin irritation if used directly. You can add a few tablespoons of carrier oil and a few drops of your preferred essential oil to the water to help prevent dryness and cracked heels while soaking your feet.
